name: 陳志鏗
objective: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括主動煞車控制系統介紹，將針對ABS, TCS, ESP 及 SBC 煞車系統原理介紹，煞車系統及控制器之數學模式及設計等，應用實例介紹。
schedule:
1. Introduction to Active Braking Control Systems   (1 week)
2. Introduction to ABS, TCS, ESP and SBC          (2 weeks)
3. Control-oriented Models of Braking Dynamics (2 weeks) 
4. Braking Control Systems Design: Actuators with Continuous Dynamics (2 week)
5. Introduction to Simulation Tools (1 week)
6. Midterm test (1 week)
7. Braking Control Systems Design: Actuators with Discrete Dynamics    (2 weeks) 
8. Longitudinal Wheel Slip Estimation (2.5 weeks) 
9. Mixed Slip and Deceleration Control (2.5 weeks) 
10. Final Project with Simulation (2 weeks) 
11. Final Test
scorePolicy:
Homework 20%
Midterm test 25%
Final project 30%
FInal Exam 25%
materials:
Text Book: S. M. Savaresi, M. Tanelli, Active Braking Control Systems Design for Vehicles, Springer, 2010

Reference Book: Brakes, Brake control and driver assistance systems: Function, Regulation and Components (Bosch Professional Automotive Information) 2015th Edition
